description:
Soran`s match against Kinosaka has begun. Despite the pressure put on them by Tenkawa Shogo`s power, Soran leads the score going into the second half. Arimura Rinto sends in Hazama, whose specialty is dirty play. The match begins shifting in Kinosaka`s favor, and Arimura is certain he will win, but Haruma Riku chooses a certain course of action...
Source: crunchyroll
